        Parameters:
        projection - Projection for your map
        minZoom -
        maxZoom -
        id - unique ID used in caching
        baseUrl - For geoserver example: http://MYSERVER/geoserver/SERVICE/wms?transparent=true&
        style - for Style parameter in WMS request
        layer - for Layers parameter
        format - for Format parameter
